name: Cosmic S.N.A.F.U.
description:
Congratulations on your purchase of an Embrown Spacefarer. Your new vessel is equipped with many state-of-the-art devices to help you keep track of the many hazards of interplanetary travel.

Steering and thrust controls, however, are optional extras.

Cosmic S.N.A.F.U. was made for GMTK Jam 2020.
You can download the source code here.

Code by JohnGabrielUK
Art by D4yz_Ag0
Music by MayaComposer
